description: The Young Merchant is representing the Merchants, and a very cunning business entrepreneur. First sceptical about the Crimson Scholar, he realizes fast that her methods might lead to him being able to expand his fortune on a large scale. He eventually involves the whole kingdom into his scheme, raising up the prices of certain foods. He says at first he is a merchant, then a human, which is why he also starts to trade with the Demon Realm after having been approached by the Dragon Princess.
name: Seinen Shounin
